config.dataMode.description: Source of game data: 'remote' (download from URL) or 'local' (read from directory).
config.remoteUrl.description: URL to the master database JSON file (used in remote mode).
config.localPath.description: Absolute path to the local FCDB distribution directory e.g., /path/to/fcdb/dist/pico8 (used in local mode).
